data.title: MLB Roundup: Padres rally for a win and series sweep over Pirates
data.meta_description: Luis ArrÃ¡ez hit an RBI double to cap a three-run ninth inning that put the San Diego Padres ahead for a 7-6 win and series sweep of the Pittsburgh Pirates on Thursday afternoon.
